text: Prison entrance Ullersmo Prison () is a prison in Ullensaker, Akershus. It was opened in 1970. The prison was intended as a replacement for the Botsfengselet in Oslo. It is used for long term prisoners from the whole of Norway, and has room for 205 inmates. The prison contains a sick ward, mechanic and carpentry workshops as well as a school. ==Governors== *Knut Eigum (1989-1999) *Ellen C. Bjercke (1999-2010) *Tom A. Enger (2010-2014) ==References== == External links == Official website in Norwegian Category:Ullensaker Category:Prisons in Norway Category:1970 establishments in Norway Category:Organizations established in 1970
title: Ullersmo Prison
